comments.text:
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:9.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/9.0

For desktop use, the font on the Dashboard at https://myapps.mozillalabs.com/ is not very readable: it is too thin/tall, and the text in the help popup is too small. Zooming in for convenience pushes the Help icon and pagination controls below the edge of the screen.
comments.raw_text:
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:9.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/9.0
